%navigation%
Commands
.ccp - Displays player's control panel
.changepassword - Allows changing password to player's account
.repair - Shows a repair panel. When used all items are stored in the warhouse.
.join/.leave - Use this commands to register or unregister on running events
.premium - Use this command to check your premium account information
.engage/.gotolove/.divorce - Use this command to marry,divorce or teleport yourself to your love
.sellbuffs - A very basic interface allowing to set up as buff store
\instancezone - Check remaining time for instance restriction
\dwarvenmanufacture - Establishes a private Dwarven Manufacture
\generalmanufacture - Establishes a private Common manufacture
All commands are free to use for everyone!
DWARVEN MANUFACTURE - COMMUNITY BOARD
